00047 class lgObject
00048 {
00049     friend class lgEvent;
00050     friend class lgVoice;
00051     friend class lgSequence;
00052         friend class lgSegment;
00053     friend class lgTag;
00054         friend class lgChord;
00055 
00056 protected:
00057     lgObject *nextI;
00058     virtual void setNext( lgObject *ptr );
00059     
00060 public :
00061         void accept( stringVisitor v );
00062     
00063         lgObject *next( void )
00064                 { return nextI; };
00065 
00066     lgObject( void );
00067 
00070         virtual string toString( lgVoice *callingSeq = NULL )
00071         {       string s;
00072                 callingSeq = NULL; // supress warning
00073                 return s;};
00074 
00076         virtual void write( FILE *out,
00077                                         lgVoice * = NULL/*dummy sequence */ )
00078         {
00079                 if( out )
00080                         fprintf( out, toString().c_str() );
00081         };
00082 
00083         virtual lgDuration pos( void )
00084         { return lgDuration(); };
00085 };
